response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $10,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I believe this is an opportunity not to be missed. I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive and designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while securing this valuable asset for your needs. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with our top-tier product.", "product_price": 9500}
